game.name: Swimming Accident First Aid
game.description:
Oh, my god! A little girl has got into the biggest trouble of her life. She loves swimming and generally visiting the pool to have fun. But, today is not her day since she meets with an unexpected tragedy. She suddenly starts drowning and reaches at the bottom of pool. You are also available in that pool and have taken her out. But taking her out would not be enough for her. Give her a needful treatment to get her recovered from this consciousness!
Luckily, you are a doctor and know very well what kind of first aid is needed in such a case. Follow all the useful first aid steps before the ambulance reaches there in this brand new doctor game! Your knowledge about first aid will definitely help you overcome this problem and diagnose her condition fast. Tap her shoulder with gentle hands and try to wake her up to check the status of her consciousness! Call 911 right away in case of getting no response from her!
Use the stethoscope, give her cardiac massage for 30 times, and then give her 2 slow gentle breaths by placing your mouth over hers! Do not forget to keep her warm using a blanket or a towel in case if she wakes up in this one of the swimming games for kids! Once it is done, your task is to help her find a lovely outfit. Choose from different outfits, hairstyles and other accessories in this one of the top dress up games for girls! Explore more fun possibilities on atmegame.com for free, no download required!
